nodes.text: Hirsi was a planet on the Cerean Reach in the Mid Rim.
The Qwohog species was native to Hirsi.
During the Imperial Period, the planet environment was devastated. The planet was subjugated by the Galactic Empire for its rudic crystal mines during the Galactic Civil War.
The planet was later destroyed by the resurgent Empire's Galaxy Gun during Operation Shadow Hand.
"Unstated Canon in Star Wars: The Essential Atlas" – Continuity, Criticisms, and Captain Panaka, Daniel Wallace's StarWars.com Blog (content now obsolete; archived from the original)
